meanings.sent1: She always tries to outbless others with her kind deeds.
meanings.sent2: The kind old man would outbless everyone in the village with his generosity.
meanings.sent3: The friendly competition to outbless each other brought joy to the community.
meanings.sent4: Her ability to outbless others was like a shining beacon of goodness.
meanings.sent5: In her heart, she held the power to outbless anyone she met.

meanings.definition: To bestow more blessings than someone else.
meanings.sent1: He would always outbless his friends with thoughtful gifts.
meanings.sent2: During the holiday season, she would outbless her siblings with heartfelt presents.
meanings.sent3: The race to outbless each other during the charity event was heartwarming.
meanings.sent4: Her generosity knew no bounds as she continued to outbless those around her.
meanings.sent5: The little girl's mission was to outbless everyone she encountered with her smiles.
